languages.text: "Ну, Махарий Зауэрбэк только что дротики не швыряет в твой портрет. Женщин он выбирает с большим умом, чем врагов. Он пытается переманить на свою сторону Гапрак, но та слишком напугана после фиаско на Кьяве Гамма".

traits.locale_text: "Ну, Махарий Зауэрбек только что дротики не швыряет в твой портрет. Женщин он выбирает с большим умом, чем врагов. Он пытается переманить на свою сторону Гапрак, но та слишком напугана после фиаско на Кьява Гамме".

languages.text: "Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: "Ну, Махарий Зауэрбэк только что дротики не швыряет в твой портрет. Женщин он выбирает с большим умом, чем врагов. Он пытается переманить на свою сторону Гапрак, но та слишком напугана после фиаско на Кьяве Гамма".

traits.locale_text: "Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

"Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

"Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

"Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

"Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

languages.text: 「そうだな、マハリウス・ザウアーバックはほぼ間違いなく、お前の肖像画にダーツを投げている。女性を見る目はあっても敵には鈍い。ギャプラックを自分側に引き込もうとしているが、そちらはキアヴァ・ガンマでの失態以後は怯えきっている」
languages.original_text: "Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな、マハリウス・ザウアーバックはほぼ間違いなく、お前の肖像画にダーツを投げている。女性を見る目はあっても敵には鈍い。ギャプラックを自分側に引き込もうとしているが、そちらはキアヴァ・ガンマでの失態以後は怯えきっている」

languages.text: “马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克正打算朝你的画像上丢飞镖。他很擅长选择女人，但不怎么擅长选择敌人。他正打算拉拢托丽安娜加入他那边，但基亚瓦伽马星的那场惨剧已经让她吓破了胆。”
languages.original_text: "Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: “马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克正打算朝你的画像上丢飞镖。他很擅长选择女人，但不怎么擅长选择敌人。他正打算拉拢托丽安娜加入他那边，但基亚瓦伽马星的那场惨剧已经让她吓破了胆。”

languages.text: «Bueno, Macharius Sauerback no es de los que se ponen a tirar dardos a un retrato. Se le da mejor elegir a las mujeres que a sus enemigos. Quiere tener a la Gaprak de su parte, pero ella sigue asustada por el fiasco en Kiava Gamma».
languages.original_text: "Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, Macharius Sauerback no es de los que se ponen a tirar dardos a un retrato. Se le da mejor elegir a las mujeres que a sus enemigos. Quiere tener a la Gaprak de su parte, pero ella sigue asustada por el fiasco en Kiava Gamma».

languages.text: « Eh bien, Macharius Sauerback pourrait aussi bien tirer des fléchettes sur votre portrait. Il semble choisir ses femmes avec plus de soin que ses ennemis. Il essaie de rallier Gaprak à sa cause, mais depuis le fiasco de Kiava Gamma, elle a bien trop peur pour prendre ce genre de risque. »
languages.original_text: "Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, Macharius Sauerback pourrait aussi bien tirer des fléchettes sur votre portrait. Il semble choisir ses femmes avec plus de soin que ses ennemis. Il essaie de rallier Gaprak à sa cause, mais depuis le fiasco de Kiava Gamma, elle a bien trop peur pour prendre ce genre de risque. »

languages.text: "Nun, Macharius Sauerback würde am liebsten Pfeile auf Euer Porträt werfen. Er hat bei der Auswahl von Frauen ein besseres Händchen als bei Feinden. Er will Gaprak auf seine Seite ziehen, aber sie hat nach dem Fiasko auf Kiava Gamma zu viel Angst."
languages.original_text: "Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Macharius Sauerback würde am liebsten Pfeile auf Euer Porträt werfen. Er hat bei der Auswahl von Frauen ein besseres Händchen als bei Feinden. Er will Gaprak auf seine Seite ziehen, aber sie hat nach dem Fiasko auf Kiava Gamma zu viel Angst."

languages.text: "Macharius Sauerback'in portrene dart fırlatmasına ramak kaldı. Kadın seçimi konusunda düşman seçiminden daha akıllı. Gaprak'ı yanına çekmeye çalışıyor, Gaprak'sa Kiava Gama'daki fiyaskodan sonra buna cesaret edemiyor."
languages.original_text: "Well, Macharius Sauerback is all but throwing darts at your portrait. He is more astute at choosing women than enemies. He is trying to entice Gaprak to his side, but she is too frightened after the fiasco on Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Macharius Sauerback'in portrene dart fırlatmasına ramak kaldı. Kadın seçimi konusunda, düşman seçiminden daha akıllı. Gaprak'ı kendi yanına çekmeye çalışıyor ama Kiava Gama'daki fiyasko sonrası Gaprak'ın buna cesareti kalmadı."
